name: Recipient Picker Redesign
description: Three approaches to investor updates recipient selection: audience-first mode toggle, group toggle cards, and email-style token field with smart autocomplete. All include NDA warnings, already-sent indicators, and external recipient support.

versions.notes: Original exploration: grouped contacts with checkboxes and selected chips bar
Option A — Audience-First: Two-mode choice (All contacts vs Custom) inspired by email composer v2, with NDA warning banner and collapsible groups
Option B — Group Toggle Cards: Groups as first-class cards with toggle switches, avatar stacks, expand-to-override, NDA warnings at group level
Option C — Token Field: Gmail/Linear-style To field with dark group tokens and light individual tokens, smart autocomplete with groups-first dropdown, NDA warning bar
In-Editor Context: Full two-column editor layout with all 3 options + current design shown in the actual sidebar context (Preflight → Recipients → Delivery). Tab switcher to compare.

Custom Groups Integration: User-created investor groups (from Investors table) appear as 'Your Groups' above auto-computed 'Smart Groups' in the token field dropdown. Custom groups get colored token chips (blue-100/blue-700), smart groups get dark inverse chips. Shows overlap handling, 'via group' attribution, and member firm names in subtitles.
